General.Name: Joint-Stock Company Krasnyj Octyabr RUB1 PRF(RUB)
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company Krasnyj Octyabr produces and sells confectionery products in Russia. The company was founded in 1867 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
General.Address: St. Small Krasnoselskaya, 7, p. 24., Moscow, Russia, 107140
